data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kashani, Ghasem M., Abedini, Ahdiyeh, Montesanto, Giuseppe (2018): Terrestrial isopods of the family Eubelidae Budde-Lund, 1899 from Iran, with description of a new species (Isopoda, Oniscidea). ZooKeys 801: 177-187, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.801.23340, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.801.23340
